				<li class="ie-shadow"></li>

			<ul class="col two">
				<li>
					<a href="/engineering/index.html">
						<h5>Engineering &amp; Technology</h5>
						<p>All the options, including Bluetooth, GPS and Satellite Radio</p>
					</a>
				</li>
				<li>
					<a href="/why-subaru/reviews-awards.html">
						<h5>Industry Reviews &amp; Awards</h5>
						<p>See what the industry experts are saying about Subaru.</p>
					</a>
				</li>
				<li>
					<a href="/tools/compare-vehicles/index.html">
						<h5>Vehicle Comparison Tool</h5>
						<p>Stack up every Subaru model against the competition.</p>
					</a>
				</li>
				<li class="ie-shadow"></li>
			</ul>
			<ul class="col three">
                            <li class="first">
					<h4>More</h4>
				</li>
				<li>
					<a href="/why-subaru/index.html">Overview</a>

			</ul>
		</div>
	</li>
	<li class="tools ">
		<a class="drop prevent-links" href="/financial-tools/index.html"><p>Financial Tools</p></a>
		<div class="drop-down-sticker">

			</ul>

					</a>
				</li>

					<a href="/finance-center/guaranteed-trade-in-program/index.html">

					</a>
				</li>
				<li class="ie-shadow"></li>
			</ul>

    var dealerSearchString = "City/State or ZIP";
    var headerDealerId = "none";
    var noPreferredDealer = true;
    var requestUri = "/vehicles/impreza/index.html";
</script>

<!--  component: 0_html / footer_legal.html.mtl -->
<div class="comp898 nav_footer_legal" >
  <ul class="policy">
    <li><a href="/company/privacy.html">Privacy Policy</a></li>
    <li><a href="/company/privacy.html#ca">California Privacy Policy</a></li>
    <li><a href="/my-subaru/privacy.html">MySubaru Privacy Policy</a></li>
	<li class="last">
		<!--
			Evidon tag
			cid: 2072
			pid: 613
			DO NOT REMOVE
		-->
		<a id="_bapw-link" href="#" target="_blank"><span>AdChoices</span><img id="_bapw-icon" style="border:0 !important;padding-left:5px !important;margin-bottom:-3px !important;"/></a>
		<script>
			//<![CDATA[
		(function () {
		var g = 613,
			i = 2072,
			j = 1,
			a = false,
			h = document,
			l = h.getElementById("_bapw-link"),
			e = (h.location
				.protocol == "https:"),
			f = (e ? "https" : "http") + "://",
			c = f + "c.betrad.com/pub/",
			m = window._bap_p_overrides,
			k = e || (m && m.hasOwnProperty(g) && m[g]
				.new_window);

		function b(n) {
			var d = new Image();
			d.src = f + "l.betrad.com/pub/p.gif?pid=" + g + "&ocid=" + i + "&i" + n + "=1&r=" + Math
				.random()
		}
		h.getElementById("_bapw-icon")
			.src = c + "icon1.png";
		l.onmouseover = function () {
			if (/#$/.test(l.href)) {
				l.href = "http://info.evidon.com/pub_info/" + g + "?v=1&nt=" + j + "&nw=" + (k ? "true" : "false")
			}
		};
		l.onclick = function () {
			function d(p, s) {
				var q = h.getElementsByTagName("head")[0] || h
					.documentElement,
					o = a,
					n = h.createElement("script");

				function r() {
					n.onload = n
						.onreadystatechange = null;
					q.removeChild(n);
					s()
				}
				n.src = p;
				n.onreadystatechange = function () {
					if (!o && (this.readyState == "loaded" || this
						.readyState == "complete")) {
						o = true;
						r()
					}
				};
				n.onload = r;
				q.insertBefore(n, q.firstChild)
			}
			if (k) {
				b("c");
				return true
			}
			this.onclick = "return " + a;
			d(f + "ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.8.3/jquery.min.js", function () {
				d(c + "pub2.js", function () {
					BAPW.i(l, {
						pid: g,
						ocid: i
					})
				})
			});
			return a
		};
		b("i")
	}());
	//]]>
</script>
	</li>
  </ul>
  <ul class="language">

  
  	<li class="disabled">English</li>
  	<li class="last"><a href="/chinese/index.html">&#20013;&#25991; Chinese</a></li>
  

  </ul>
  <p><strong><sup>&copy;</sup> Subaru of America, Inc.</strong> Use of this site signifies your acceptance of the <a href="/company/conditions.html">Terms &amp; Conditions</a></p>
  <div class="clear"></div>
</div>
<!-- end component: 0_html / footer_legal.html.mtl -->

					<div class="clear"></div>
				</div>
				<div class="clear"></div>
			</div>
			
			<div class="footer_three">
				

	<script type="text/javascript">
		Subaru.disclaimers = [];
	</script>
	<div class="legal-disclaimer">
		<a class="legal" href="#" title="Legal">LEGAL</a>
		<div class="legal-disclaimer-body">
		</div>
	</div>
	<script type="text/javascript">

		Subaru.disclaimers.push("/content/disclaimer/global/article.xml");

	</script>


			</div>
		</div>
		
		



<!-- End: Primary JavaScript -->

	  	


		
		

<div id="gallery-360-interior" class="clearfix hide vsp-modal">
</div>

<script type="text/html" id="vehicle-interior-reel-template" >
    <div id="vsp-interior-modal-reel">
        <img id="int-reel" class="reel-modal" src="" alt="" width="640" height="440"/>
        <img id="int-control-left"  class="reel-control" src="/content/images/site/reel_control_left.png" alt=""/>
    	<img id="int-control-right" class="reel-control" src="/content/images/site/reel_control_right.png" alt=""/>
    </div>
    <p class="modal-trim-shown">Trim Shown</p>
</script>


<div class="payment-calculator clearfix hide vsp-modal" id="payment-calculator"></div>

<script type="text/html" id="payment-calculator-template" >
	<% 
		var input;
		var formData = {
			'choose-model': trims[0].code,
			'apr': '0.0',
			'payment-period': '12',
			'down-payment': '0',
			'trade-in-value': '0'
		};
		for (var i = 0; i < cache.length; i++) {
			input = cache[i].split('=');
			formData[input[0]] = input[1];
		};
	%>
    <form id="payment-calculator-form">
		<fieldset class="model-section">
			<legend>Choose Model</legend>
			<p>We&#39;ll need to know for which model you are estimating payments.</p>
			<select id="choose-model" name="choose-model">
				<% var trims = obj.trims, selected = ''; %>
				<% 
				for (var i = 0; i < trims.length; i++) { 
					selected = (trims[i].code === formData['choose-model']) ? 'selected="selected"' : '';
				%>
					<option value="<%= trims[i].code %>" <%= selected %>><%= trims[i].name %> - <span><%= Subaru.Utils.Format.formatNumber(trims[i].msrp, '$') %></span></option>
				<% } %>
			</select>
			<img class="model-image" alt="Subaru Image" src="" />
		</fieldset>
		<fieldset class="user-section">
			<legend class="left">Calculate</legend><br />
			<p>Enter your preferred terms.</p>
			<label for="apr" class="pc-label">APR <span>(0.0% - 20.0%)</span></label>
			<div id="pc-apr-slider-bg" class="clearfix">
	        	<!-- Slider -->
	       		<div id="pc-apr-slider"></div>
	       		<span class="slider-value begin-value">0</span>
	       		<span class="slider-value end-value">20</span>
	    	</div>
			
	    	<input type="text" id="apr" pattern="\d+(\.\d{1})?" name="apr" value="<%= formData['apr'] %>" class="apr-input"/>&nbsp;<strong class="symbol">%</strong> <br />
	    	
	    	<p class="pc-label">Payment Period <span>(in months)</span></p>
	        <div id="pc-payment-period">
	        	<%
	        		var checked = 'checked="checked"';
	        	%>
	            <label for="m-12" class="<%= (formData['payment-period'] == 12) ? 'active' : '' %>">12</label>
	            <input type="radio" id="m-12" name="payment-period" value="12" <%= (formData['payment-period'] == 12) ? checked : '' %>/>
	            
	            <label for="m-24" class="<%= (formData['payment-period'] == 24) ? 'active' : '' %>">24</label>
	            <input type="radio" id="m-24" name="payment-period" value="24" <%= (formData['payment-period'] == 24) ? checked : '' %>/>
	            
	            <label for="m-36" class="<%= (formData['payment-period'] == 36) ? 'active' : '' %>">36</label>
	            <input type="radio" id="m-36" name="payment-period" value="36" <%= (formData['payment-period'] == 36) ? checked : '' %>/>
	            
	            <label for="m-48" class="<%= (formData['payment-period'] == 48) ? 'active' : '' %>">48</label>
	            <input type="radio" id="m-48" name="payment-period" value="48" <%= (formData['payment-period'] == 48) ? checked : '' %>/>
	            
	            <label for="m-60" class="<%= (formData['payment-period'] == 60) ? 'active' : '' %> last">60</label>
	            <input type="radio" id="m-60" name="payment-period" value="60" <%= (formData['payment-period'] == 60) ? checked : '' %> />
	        </div>
			<label for="down-paymwent" class="pc-label">Down Payment</label>
			<strong class="symbol">$</strong> <input type="text" id="down-payment" name="down-payment" maxlength="5" class="pc-input" value="<%= formData['down-payment'] %>" pattern="\d+(,\d+)?"/><br />
			<label for="trade-in-value" class="pc-label">Trade-In Value</label>
			<strong class="symbol">$</strong> <input type="text" id="trade-in-value" name="trade-in-value" maxlength="5" class="pc-input" value="<%= formData['trade-in-value'] %>" pattern="\d+(,\d+)?"/>
		</fieldset>
		<fieldset class="monthly-payment-section">
			<legend>Monthly Payment</legend>
			<p>Estimated for a <span id="selected-car"><%= Subaru.VSP.modelYear + ' ' + Subaru.VSP.modelName + ' ' + trims[0].description %>.</span></p>
			<div class="payment-result invisible">
				<p class="payment-amount" id="">$000</p>
				<p><span id="selected-apr">0.0</span>% APR for <span id="selected-months"><%= formData['payment-period'] %></span> mos.</p>
			</div>
		</fieldset>
	</form>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="zc-modal-template" >
	<form id="zipCode-form">
		<fieldset>
			<legend class="vsp-header">Knowing your location allows us to display the proper information for your area.</legend>
			<input name="zipcode" id="zipcode" class="input-shadow" type="text" value="<%= zipCode %>" maxlength="5" />
		  	<a href="" id="submit-zip-code" class="vsp-submit-button trk-submitZip">GO</a>
		</fieldset>
		<img class="model-image" alt="<%=Subaru.VSP.modelName%>" src="/content/images/my<%=Subaru.VSP.modelYear.substr(2, 2)%>/<%=Subaru.VSP.modelCode.toUpperCase()%>/handrailpopup.jpg" />
		<div class="clear"></div>
	</form>
</script>


<script type="text/html" id="raq-template" >
	<form id="raq-form" action="/form/quote/vsp" method="post" content-type="application/x-www-form-urlencoded">
		<fieldset class="model-section">
			<legend class="vsp-header">Choose a Model</legend>
			<p>We&#39;ll need to know for which model are you requesting a quote</p>
			<select id="choose-model" tabindex="6">
				<%= trimsTpl({'trims': obj.trims, 'cache': obj.cache}) %>
			</select>
			<img class="model-image" alt="" src="" />
		</fieldset>
        <%var formData = obj.cache;%>
		<fieldset class="user-section">
			<legend class="left vsp-header">Your Info</legend>
			<p class="required-label"><span class="required-symbol">* </span>= Required field</p>
			<div class="contact-by-section">
				<p class="contact-label">Contact me by:</p>
                <% contactByValue = formData['contactBy'];
                   if(contactByValue == undefined)
                       contactByValue = 'email';
                %>
				<input type="radio" value="email" id="email-contact" name="contactBy" class="left" <%= (contactByValue === 'email') ? 'checked' : '' %> />
				<label for="email-contact" class="email-label" >Email</label>
				<input type="radio" value="email-phone" id="phone-contact" name="contactBy" class="left" <%= (contactByValue === 'email-phone') ? 'checked' : '' %> />
				<label for="phone-contact" class="phone-label" >Email &amp; Phone</label> 
			</div>
			<label for="first-name" class="raq-label">First Name <span class="required-symbol">*</span></label>
			<input type="text" id="first-name" name="firstName" maxlength="30" class="input-raq input-shadow" tabindex="1" value="<%=decodeURIComponent(formData['firstName']) != 'undefined' ? decodeURIComponent(formData['firstName']).replace(/\+/g, " "): ''%>" />
			<label for="last-name" class="raq-label">Last Name <span class="required-symbol">*</span></label>
			<input type="text" id="last-name" name="lastName" maxlength="30" class="input-raq input-shadow" tabindex="2" value="<%=decodeURIComponent(formData['lastName']) != 'undefined' ? decodeURIComponent(formData['lastName']).replace(/\+/g, " "): ''%>" />
			<label for="email" class="raq-label">Email <span class="required-symbol">*</span></label>
			<input type="text" id="email" name="email" maxlength="100" class="input-raq input-shadow" tabindex="3" value="<%=decodeURIComponent(formData['email']) != 'undefined' ? decodeURIComponent(formData['email']).replace(/\+/g, " "): '' %>" />
			<label for="confirm-email" class="raq-label">Confirm Email <span class="required-symbol">*</span></label>
			<input type="text" id="confirm-email" name="confirmEmail" maxlength="100" class="input-raq input-shadow" tabindex="4" value="<%=decodeURIComponent(formData['confirmEmail']) != 'undefined' ? decodeURIComponent(formData['confirmEmail']).replace(/\+/g, " "): '' %>" />
			<div class="user-phone-section">
				  <%
				  var phoneValue = "";
				  if(!Subaru.Utils.Validation.isEmpty(formData['phone'])){
				      phoneValue = Subaru.Utils.Format.unformatPhoneNumber(formData['phone']);
				  }%>
				<label for="phone-number" class="raq-label">Phone <span class="required-symbol">*</span></label>
				<input type="text" id="phone-number" name="phone"
				       class="input-phone <%= Subaru.Utils.Validation.isEmpty(formData['phone'])? 'disabled': '' %>"
				       autocomplete="off" <%=(contactByValue === 'email-phone' && !Subaru.Utils.Validation.isEmpty(formData['phone'])) ? '' : disabled='disabled' %>
				       maxlength="10" tabindex="5" value="<%=phoneValue%>" />
				<%if(contactByValue == 'email'){%>
				<div class="disabled"></div>
				<%}%>
			</div>
			<div class="user-call-section">
				<select id="call-time" class="input-time">
					<option value="PHONE_ANYTIME" selected>Anytime</option>
					<option value="PHONE_MORNING">Mid-morning</option>
					<option value="PHONE_MIDDAY">Mid-day</option>
					<option value="PHONE_EVENING">Evening</option>
				</select>
				<%if(contactByValue == 'email'){%>
				<div class="disabled"></div>
				<%}%>
			</div>
            <% var preferredDealer = obj.preferredDealer;
               var contactMethod = formData['contactMethod'];
               if(Subaru.Utils.Validation.isEmpty(contactMethod))
                    contactMethod = 'EMAIL';
            %>
			<input type="hidden" id="get-quote-contact-by" name="contactMethod" value="<%=contactMethod%>" />
			<input type="hidden" id="get-quote-year" name="year" value="<%=Subaru.VSP.modelYear%>" />
            <input type="hidden" id="get-quote-comments" name="comments" value="<%=formData['comments']%>" />
			<input type="hidden" id="get-quote-zipcode" name="zipcode" value="<%=Subaru.VSP.zipCode%>" />
			<input type="hidden" id="get-quote-dealer-code" name="dealerId" value="<%= preferredDealer.id%>" />
            <input type="hidden" id="get-quote-trim-name" name="trimName" value="<%=formData['trimName']%>" />
            <input type="hidden" id="get-quote-trim-code" name="trimCode" value="<%=formData['trimCode']%>" />
            <input type="hidden" id="get-quote-model-name" name="modelName" value="<%= Subaru.VSP.modelName%>" />
            <input type="hidden" id="get-quote-model-code" name="modelCode" value="<%= Subaru.VSP.modelCode%>" />
            <input type="hidden" name="mapRadius" value = "0" />
			<input type="hidden" name="tradeYear" value = "0" />
			<input type="hidden" name="tradeMileage" value = "0" />
			<input type="hidden" name="sourceCode" value = "18" />
		</fieldset>
		<fieldset class="send-request-section">
			<legend class="vsp-header">Send Request</legend>
			<p>Request will be sent to the dealer below.</p>
			<div class="dealer-data">
				<h3 class="dealer-name" id="raq-dealer-name"><%= preferredDealer.name %></h3>
				<span id="raq-dealer-distance">(<%= preferredDealer.distance %> miles)</span><br />
				<span id="raq-dealer-street"><%= preferredDealer.street %></span>
				<span id="raq-dealer-state"><%= preferredDealer.city %>&nbsp;<%= preferredDealer.state%>&nbsp;<%= preferredDealer.zipcode %></span>
				<span class="dealer-number mm-phone-number" id="raq-dealer-phone"><%= preferredDealer.phone %></span>
			</div>
			<a class="change-dealer-link" id="change-dealer" href="javascript:void(0);">Change</a>
			<input class="submit-button vsp-submit-button trk-raqSubmit" type="button" value="Send My Request" id="submit-raq" tabindex="7" />
		</fieldset>
	</form>
	<div class="thank-you">
		<h2>Thank you</h2>
		<p>Your request has been submitted to <span class="dealer-name-thankyou"><%= preferredDealer.name %></span>. They will connect with you in the next 48 hours to discuss your vehicle.</p>
	</div>
	<div class="thank-you-error">
		<h2>Request a Quote</h2>
		<p>Your Request A Quote could not be completed. Please try again.</p>
	</div>
</script>
<script type="text/html" id="raq-trims-template" >
    <%var trims = obj.trims, formData = obj.cache, selected = "";%>
	<% for (var i = 0; i < trims.length; i++) { %>
        <%selected = (trims[i].code === formData['trimCode']) ? 'selected="selected"' : '';%>
		<option value="<%= trims[i].code %>" <%= selected %>><%= trims[i].name %> - <%= Subaru.Utils.Format.formatNumber(trims[i].msrp, '$')%></option>
	<% } %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="so-modal-template" >
	<div class="offers-container">
		<%= specialOffers %>
	</div>
	<div class="dealer-information">
        <% var preferredDealer = obj.preferredDealer; %>
		<h3>Nearest Dealer</h3>
		<a class="dealer-change" href="#">Change</a>
		<p class="dealer-name"><%= preferredDealer.name%></p>
		<p class="dealer-distance">(<%= preferredDealer.distance%> Miles)</p>
		<p class="dealer-address"><%= preferredDealer.street%> <%= preferredDealer.city%>, <%= preferredDealer.state%> <%= preferredDealer.zipcode%></p>
		<p class="dealer-phone mm-phone-number"><%= preferredDealer.phone%></p>
		<a class="see-local-offers trk-offerLocal" id="see-local-offers" href="<%= preferredDealer.link%>/link?program=soa&page=SPECIAL_OFFERS" target="_blank">See Local Special Offers</a>
	</div>
</script>
<script type="text/html" id="spec-offer-template">
	<% var specialOffers = obj.specialOffers; %>
	<%
        if(specialOffers.length > 0 && !Subaru.Utils.Validation.isBlank(specialOffers[0].id)){
            for (var i = 0; i < specialOffers.length; i++) { %>
                <%if(!Subaru.Utils.Validation.isBlank(specialOffers[i].id)){%>
                    <div class="offer-box">
                        <h3><%= specialOffers[i].title %></h3>
                        <p class="offer-desc"><%= specialOffers[i].details %></p>                        
                        <a class="view-details" href="#">View Details</a>
                        <div class="offer-details">
                            <p><%= specialOffers[i].disclaimer %></p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <%if(i % 2 != 0){%>
                    <div class="clear"></div>
                    <%}%>
                <%}%>
	        <%}%>
        <%}else{%>
            <p id="not-offer-message">Sorry, based on your search there are currently no special offers available</p>
        <%}%>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="vehicle-interior-template" >
    <div id="gallery-container" class="animated fade slide-x trk-galleryInterior" data-gallery="interior" style="width: 100%; opacity: 1;">
        <div class="top-gradient gradient-360">&nbsp;</div>
        <span class="section-title">360&deg; &amp; COLORS</span>

				<div class="share-description"><span>Share the Impreza via Email</span></div>
			</li>

			</li>

<script type="text/html" id="vsp-share-email-template">

    <h1>Send an Email</h1>

    <div class="share-email-notes">
    <span class="asterisk">*</span> = Required field
    </div>

    <div class="share-email-side1">
        <label>Share this:</label>
        <div id="share-email-link">
            <h2><%= shareemail_title %></h2>
            <p><%= shareemail_description %></p>
            <a href="<%= shareemail_link %>"><%= shareemail_link %></a>
        </div>
    </div>

    <form id="share-email-form" class="share-email-side2" action="">
        <label>To <span class="asterisk">*</span></label>
        <p>
            Up to five recipients.<br />
            Separate multiple emails with a comma (,).
        </p>
        <input id="share-email-to" name="emails" />
        <p id="share-email-to-error" class="error-hidden error-text">&nbsp;</p>

        <label>Your Name <span class="asterisk">*</span></label>
        <input id="share-email-name" name="name" type="text" size="100" maxlength="100" />
        <p id="share-email-name-error" class="error-hidden error-text">&nbsp;</p>

        <label class="comments">Comments <span id="comments-count">0 / 255</span></label>
        <textarea id="share-email-comments" name="comments" rows="4" cols="30"></textarea>

        <div id="share-email-buttons">
            <button id="share-email-reset" type="reset">Cancel</button>
            <button id="share-email-submit" type="submit" class="selected">Send</button>
        </div>

        <input id="ws-from" name="from" type="hidden" value="donotreply@subaru.com" />
        <input id="ws-subject" name="subject" type="hidden" value="" />
        <input id="ws-to" name="to" type="hidden" value="" />
        <input id="ws-message" name="message" type="hidden" value="" />

    </form>

    <div class="share-email-side3">
        <h2>Thank You <span class="name"></span></h2>
        <label>Your email has been sent to:</label>
        <p>
            name1@email.com<br />
            name2@email.com<br />
            name3@email.com<br />
        </p>
    </div>

</script>

<script type="text/html" id="vsp-share-email-message">
<%= shareemail_message %>

<%= shareemail_title %>
<%= shareemail_description %>
<%= shareemail_link %>

<%= shareemail_name %>.
</script>

<div id="view-dealer-inventory" class="view-dealer-inventory container_3 fade slide-y dropdown-box"></div>
<script type="text/html" id="dealer-inventory-modal-template">
    <a href="#" class="close-drop-down animated fade">X</a>
    <div class="map-section">
        <h2 class="">Select Dealer</h2>
        <a class="change-location">Change Location</a>
        <div id="dealer-map">
        </div>
    </div>
    <ol class="dealer-list">
        <%= dealerList %>
    </ol>
    <% var preferredDealer = obj.preferredDealer; %>
    <div class="dealer-data-section">
        <h3 class="dealer-name" id="inventory-dealer-name"><%= preferredDealer.name%></h3>
        <span id="inventory-dealer-distance">(<%= preferredDealer.distance%> miles)</span><br />
        <span id="inventory-dealer-street"><%= preferredDealer.street%></span><br />
        <span id="inventory-dealer-state"><%= preferredDealer.city%>, <%= preferredDealer.state%> <%= preferredDealer.zipcode%></span><br />
        <span class="dealer-number mm-phone-number" id="inventory-dealer-phone"><%= preferredDealer.phone%></span>
        <%
            var inventory = "/all-inventory/index.htm?SBmodel="+(Subaru.VSP.modelName).replace(' ', '+')+"&SByear="+Subaru.VSP.modelYear+"&SBmake=Subaru&SBprice=clear";
            var validURL = /^https?:\/\/([a-zA-Z\.0-9\-\_]+)([^\/])/.exec(preferredDealer.link);
            var inventoryLink = (validURL != null) ? validURL[0] + inventory: preferredDealer.link + inventory;
        %>
        <a id="view-dealer-button" class="dealer-button vsp-submit-button trk-dealerInventory" href="<%=inventoryLink%>" target="_blank"><span>View Dealer Inventory</span></a>
    </div>
</script>
<script type="text/html" id="dealer-list-modal-template">
    <% var dealers = obj.dealers;
       var preferredDealer = obj.preferredDealer;
       var dealerOptionClass = "dealer-option";
       for (var i = 0; i < dealers.length; i++) {
          var dealersSelectedClass = (dealers[i].id == preferredDealer.id) ? " selected": "";
          var lastDealersClass = (i == dealers.length-1) ? " last": "";
          var dealerName = (dealers[i].name.length >= 20) ? dealers[i].name.substr(0, 20).concat('...') : dealers[i].name;
    %>
		<li class="<%=dealerOptionClass%><%=dealersSelectedClass%><%=lastDealersClass%>"><%= dealerName %><span class="distance"> (<%= dealers[i].distance %> miles)</span></li>
    <% } %>
</script>
<script type="text/html" id="change-dealer-modal-template">
    <div class="map-section">
        <h2 class="">Select Dealer</h2>
        <a class="change-location">Change Location</a>
        <div id="change-dealer-map">
        </div>
    </div>
    <ol class="dealer-list">
        <%= dealerList %>
    </ol>
    <% var preferredDealer = obj.preferredDealer; %>
    <div class="dealer-data-section">
        <h3 class="dealer-name" id="change-dealer-name"><%= preferredDealer.name%></h3>
        <span id="change-dealer-distance">(<%= preferredDealer.distance%> miles)</span><br />
        <span id="change-dealer-street"><%= preferredDealer.street%></span><br />
        <span id="change-dealer-state"><%= preferredDealer.city%>, <%= preferredDealer.state%> <%= preferredDealer.zipcode%></span><br />
        <span class="dealer-number" id="change-dealer-phone"><%= preferredDealer.phone%></span>
        <a id="change-dealer-button" class="dealer-button vsp-submit-button" href=""><span>Use this Dealer</span></a>
    </div>
</script>
<script type="text/html" id="change-dealer-list-modal-template">
    <% var dealers = obj.dealers;
       var preferredDealer = obj.preferredDealer;
       var dealerOptionClass = "dealer-option";
    %>
    <% for (var i = 0; i < dealers.length; i++) { %>
        <% var dealersSelectedClass = (dealers[i].id == preferredDealer.id) ? " selected": "";
           var lastDealersClass = (i == dealers.length-1) ? " last": "";
           var dealerName = (dealers[i].name.length >= 20) ? dealers[i].name.substr(0, 20).concat('...') : dealers[i].name;
        %>
		<li class="<%=dealerOptionClass%><%=dealersSelectedClass%><%=lastDealersClass%>"><%= dealerName %><span class="distance"> (<%= dealers[i].distance %> miles)</span></li>
    <% } %>
</script>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var Subaru = Subaru || {};
	
	Subaru.Compare = Subaru.Compare || {};
	Subaru.Compare.External = "";
</script>

    Compare
    <% if(!Subaru.Compare.VSPEnabled){ %>
        <span class="model-name">
            <%= model %>
        </span>
        <a class="disclaimer" data-id="<%= disclaimer %>"></a>
    <% } %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="vehicle-links-template">
    
    <%
    var modelLink = vehicle.model.toLowerCase().replace(' ', '-');
    var explore = "" + "/vehicles/" + modelLink + "/index.html";
    var byo = "" + "/build-your-own/" + modelLink + ".html";
    var raq = "" + "/shopping-tools/get-quote.html?vehicle=" + this.modelCode + "&year=" + vehicle.year;
    %>

    <div class="links">
        <% if(!Subaru.Compare.VSPEnabled){ %>
            <a class="start-over" href="index.html" data-route="index.html">
                <span class="sprite icon">&nbsp;</span><span>Start Over</span>
            </a>
            <span class="divisor">&nbsp;</span>
            <a class="explore" href="<%= explore %>">
                <span class="sprite icon">&nbsp;</span><span>Explore <%= vehicle.model %></span>
            </a>
            <div class="shopping-tools">
                <span>Shopping Tools</span><span class="sprite drop-icon">&nbsp;</span>
                <ul>
                    <li>
                        <a class="link-byo" href="<%= byo %>">
                            <span class="sprite icon">&nbsp;</span><span>Build Your Own</span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <a class="link-raq" href="<%= raq %>">
                            <span class="sprite icon">&nbsp;</span><span>Request a Quote</span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <a class="link-fad" href="/tools/maps/dealer/find/">
                            <span class="sprite icon">&nbsp;</span><span>View Inventory</span>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        <% } %>
        <% if(chromeData){ %>
            <span class="chrome-powered sprite-image"></span>
        <% } %>
    </div>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="compare-share-email-template">

    <h1>Send an Email</h1>

    <div class="share-email-notes">
    <span class="asterisk">*</span> = Required field
    </div>

    <div class="share-email-side1">
        <label>Share this:</label>
        <div id="share-email-link">
            <h2><%= shareemail_title %></h2>
            <p><%= shareemail_description %></p>
            <a href="<%= shareemail_link %>"><%= shareemail_link %></a>
        </div>
    </div>

    <form id="share-email-form" class="share-email-side2" action="">
        <label>To <span class="asterisk">*</span></label>
        <p>
            Up to five recipients.<br />
            Separate multiple emails with a comma (,).
        </p>
        <input id="share-email-to" name="emails" />
        <p id="share-email-to-error" class="error-hidden error-text">&nbsp;</p>

        <label>Your Name <span class="asterisk">*</span></label>
        <input id="share-email-name" name="name" type="text" size="100" maxlength="100" />
        <p id="share-email-name-error" class="error-hidden error-text">&nbsp;</p>

        <label class="comments">Comments <span id="comments-count">0 / 255</span></label>
        <textarea id="share-email-comments" name="comments" rows="4" cols="30"></textarea>

        <div id="share-email-buttons">
            <button id="share-email-reset" type="reset">Cancel</button>
            <button id="share-email-submit" type="submit" class="selected">Send</button>
        </div>

        <input id="ws-from" name="from" type="hidden" value="donotreply@subaru.com" />
        <input id="ws-subject" name="subject" type="hidden" value="" />
        <input id="ws-to" name="to" type="hidden" value="" />
        <input id="ws-message" name="message" type="hidden" value="" />

    </form>

    <div class="share-email-side3">
        <h2>Thank You <span class="name"></span></h2>
        <label>Your email has been sent to:</label>
        <p>
            name1@email.com<br />
            name2@email.com<br />
            name3@email.com<br />
        </p>
    </div>

</script>

<script type="text/html" id="compare-share-email-message">
<%= shareemail_message %>

<%= shareemail_title %>
<%= shareemail_description %>
<%= shareemail_link %>

<%= shareemail_name %>.
</script>



<script type="text/html" id="docked-headers">
    <div id="docked-table-headers">
        <ul class="headers clearfix">
            <% 
            var vehicle, makeName, modelName, upper;
            for (var i = 0; i < vehicles.length; i++) {
                vehicle = vehicles[i];

                upper = function(match){ 
                    return match.toUpperCase(); 
                };
                makeName = (i === 0) ? '' : vehicle.makeName.toLowerCase();
                modelName = vehicle.modelName.toLowerCase().replace(/([wrx])([xv])/g, upper).replace(/([wrx])([brz])/g, upper);
            %>
                <li class="vehicle-title">
                    <p class="vehicle-name">
                        <%= vehicle.year %>  <%= makeName %> <%= modelName %>
                        <span><%= vehicle.trimName %></span>
                    </p>
                </li>
            <% } %>
        </ul>
    </div>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="complete-comparison-template">
    <div id="complete-comparison-links"><%= vehicle_links %></div>
    <div id="complete-comparison">
        <div class="vehicle-image">
            <a id="subaru-change" class="sprite-image change-link" href="#">Change</a>
            <img class="subaru-main-img" id="complete-comparison-img" src="" />
            <% var trimTitle = subaru_trim_title.replace('WRX', ''); %>
            <p class="vehicle-name"><%= subaru_model_year %> <%= subaru_model_title %> <span><%= trimTitle %></span></p>
        </div>
        <%= competitor_vehicle_template %>
        <%= comparison_table_template %>

        <div id="subaru-change-modal"></div>       
		<%= competitor_change_modal_template %>
    </div>
</script>
        
<script type="text/html" id="competitor_vehicle">
    <% for (var i = 0; i < competitors.length; i++) {
            var id    = competitors[i].trimId;
            var image = competitors[i].imageURL;
            var year  = competitors[i].year;
            var make  = competitors[i].makeName;
            var model = competitors[i].modelName;
            var trim  = competitors[i].trimName;
    %>
    <div class="vehicle-image">
        <a class="sprite-image change-link competitor-modal" data-id="<%= id %>" data-position="<%= i+1 %>" href="#">Edit</a>
        <img src="<%= image %>" />
        <p class="vehicle-name"><%= year %> <%= make.toLowerCase() %> <%= model.toLowerCase() %><span><%= trim %></span></p>
    </div>
    <% } %>
    <%
        if (competitors.length===2){
    %>
            <div class="vehicle-image">
                 <a class="sprite-image add-vehicle" data-position="3">Add</a>
            </div>
    <%  
        } else {
            if (competitors.length===1){
    %>
                <div class="vehicle-image">
                    <a class="sprite-image add-vehicle" data-position="2">Add</a>
                </div>
    <%
            }
        }
    %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="comparison_table">
    <div id="comparison-tabs" class="modern-tabs">
        <ul>
            <li class="active"><a href="#specs">SPECS</a></li>
            <li><a href="#features">FEATURES</a></li>
            <li><a href="#photos">PHOTOS</a></li>
        </ul>
        <div class="caption">
            <span class="division">|</span>
            <span class="sprite-image standard">Standard</span>
            <span class="sprite-image optional">Optional</span>
            <span class="sprite-image na">N/A</span>
            <span class="division">|</span>
            <a href="" id="collapse">Collapse All</a>
        </div>
        <div id="specs">
            <% for (var i = 0; i < specs.length; i++) {
                var category = specs[i];
                if(!category.feature){
                    var subcategories = category.families;
            %>
            <h3 class="sprite-image"><%= category.name %></h3>
            <div>
                <table>
                    <% for (var j = 0; j < subcategories.length; j++) { 
                        var subcategory = subcategories[j];
                    %>
                    <tr>
                        <td><%= subcategory.name %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[0] %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[1] %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[2] %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[3] %></td>
                    </tr>
                    <% } %>
                </table>
            </div>
           <% }} %>
        </div>
        <div id="features">
            <% for (var i = 0; i < features.length; i++) {
                var feature = features[i];
                var subcategories = feature.families;
            %>
            <h3 class="sprite-image"><%= feature.name.replace('Features', '') %></h3>
            <div>
                <table>
                    <% for (var j = 0; j < subcategories.length; j++) { 
                        var subcategory = subcategories[j];
                    %>
                    <tr>
                        <td><%= subcategory.name %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[0] %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[1] %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[2] %></td>
                        <td><%= subcategory.values[3] %></td>
                    </tr>
                    <% } %>
                </table>
            </div>
           <% } %>
        </div>
        <div id="photos">
            <% for (var i = 0; i < photos.length; i++) {
                var photo = photos[i];
                var subgalleries = photo.subgalleries;
            %>
            <h3 class="sprite-image"><%= photo.name %></h3>
            <div>
                <table>
                    <% for (var j = 0; j < subgalleries.length; j++) { 
                        var subgallery = subgalleries[j];
                        var classLazyLoad = ((i+j) !== 0 && j % 5 === 0) ? "lazy-load-next-content" : "";
                        var classHidden = (i || j > 4) ? "hidden" : "";
                    %>
                    <tr class="sub-category <%= classLazyLoad %> <%= classHidden %>">
                        <td><%= subgallery.name %></td>
                        <td></td>
                        <td></td>
                        <td></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="<%= classHidden %>" >
						<% for(var k = 0; k < 4; k++){
                            if (subgallery.photos[k]== undefined){%>
                                <td></td>
                            <%} else { %>
                            <td><img src="<%= subgallery.photos[k].image %>"  width="200" height="150"/></td>
						<% }}%>                        
                    </tr>
                    <% } %>
                </table>
            </div>
           <% } %>
        </div>
    </div>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="subaru_change_modal">
    <a href="#" id="subaru-modal-close" class="sprite-image close">&nbsp;X&nbsp;</a>
    <img id="s-img" src="/content/images/compare/subaru-modal.png" alt="Subaru Image" width="240" />
    
    <% if(!Subaru.Compare.VSPEnabled){ %>
        <div class="drop-down-container">
            <select id="year" class="subaru-year">
                <% var setSelected = '';%>
                <% _.each(years, function(year){ %> 
                    <%
                        if(selectedYear && selectedYear == year){
                            setSelected = 'selected=selected';
                        }else{
                            setSelected = '';
                        }
                    %>
                    <option value="<%= year %>" <%= setSelected %> ><%= year %></option>
                <% }); %>
            </select>   

            <select id="subaru-model" class="subaru-model">
                 <option value="Model" selected="selected">Model</option>
            </select>
        </div>
    <% } %>
    
    <div id="trim-list"></div>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="subaru-models-template" >
    <% var models = obj.models; var setSelected = ''; %>
        <option value="Model">Model</option>
    <% _.each(models, function(model){ %> 
    <%  
        if(selected && selected == model.code){
            setSelected = 'selected=selected';
        }else{
            setSelected = '';
        }
    %>                   
        <option value="<%= model.code %>" <%= setSelected %> > <%= model.name %> </option>        
    <% }); %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="subaru-trims-template" >
    <% 
        var trims = obj.trims; var inactive = ''; 
        var formater = Subaru.Utils.Format;
        var trimName = '';
        var modelUrl = '';
        _.each(trims, function(trim){
            if(selected && selected == trim.code){
               inactive = 'inactive';
            }else{
                inactive = '';
            }
            trimName = trim.name.replace('WRX', '');
            modelUrl = model.toLowerCase().replace(' ', '-');
        %>               
        <ul class="trim">
            <li class="name"><%= trimName %></li>
            <li class="price"><%= formater.formatNumber(trim.msrp, '$') %></li>
            <li class="mpg"><%= trim.mpgCity %>/<%= trim.mpgHighway %>^ MPG</li>
            <li class="select">
                <a href="#" class="trim-select <%= inactive %>" 
                data-trim-code="<%= trim.code %>" 
                data-model-code="<%= modelCode %>" 
                data-model-year="<%= modelYear %>"
                data-model-name="<%= model %>"
                data-trim-name="<%= trimName %>"
                data-model-url="<%= modelUrl %>.html">
                    Select
                </a>
            </li>
        </ul>      
    <% }); %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="competitor_change_modal">
    <div id="competitor-change-modal">
        <a href="#" id="competitor-modal-close" class="sprite-image close">&nbsp;X&nbsp;</a>
        <div class="col one">
            <select id="competitor-year" class="competitor-year">
                <option selected="selected">Year</option>
				<option value="2013">2013</option>
				<option value="2014">2014</option>
            </select>
            <select id="competitor-make" class="competitor-make" disabled="disabled">
                <option selected="selected">Make</option>
				<%= makesTpl({'makes': obj.makes}) %>
            </select>
            <select id="competitor-model" class="competitor-model" disabled="disabled">
                <option selected="selected">Model</option>
				<%= modelsTpl({'makeModels': obj.makeModels}) %>
            </select>
           <select id="competitor-trim" class="competitor-trim" disabled="disabled">
                <option selected="selected">Trim</option>
				<%= trimsTpl({'trims': obj.trims}) %>
            </select>
            
            <a href="#" id="compare-this-vehicle" class="disabled">Compare This Vehicle</a>
            <p class="or">OR</p>
        </div>

		<div id="similarsCompetitors" class="col two">			
			
		<%= similarsTpl({'vehicles': obj.vehicles}) %>

   		</div>
        
        <div id="removeButton" class="col three">
            <%= removeTpl({'data': obj.data}) %>
        </div>
    </div>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="makes-template" >
    <% var makes = obj.makes; %>
		<option value="Make" selected="selected">Make</option>
	<% _.each(makes.models, function(make){ %>					
		<option value="<%= make.get('name') %>"><%= make.get("name") %></option>		
	<% }); %>		
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="models-template" >
    <% var models = obj.makeModels; %>
		<option value="Model" selected="selected">Model</option>
	<% _.each(models.models, function(model){ %>					
		<option value="<%= model.get('modelId') %>"> <%= model.get("modelName") %> </option>		
	<% }); %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="trims-template" >
    <% var trims = obj.trims; %>
		<option value="Trim" selected="selected">Trim</option>
	<% _.each(trims.models, function(trim){ %>			
		<option value="<%= trim.get('trimId') %>"> <%= trim.get("trimName") %> </option>
	<% }); %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="similars-template">
	<% 
		var similars = obj.vehicles.similars,
		    isEdit = obj.vehicles.isEdit,
            competitors = obj.vehicles.competitors;		  
	 %>

	<% if(similars.length > 0){ %>
		<% $("#similarsCompetitors").show(); %>

		<p class="title">Select Similar Models</p>
		
		<% _.each(similars, function(similar, index){ %>
			<p class="competitor"><a href="#" class="selected-similar" data-id="<%= similar.get("trimId") %>" data-position="<%= index+1 %>"><%= similar.get("displayName") %><span> <%= similar.get("trimName") %> </span></a></p>
		<% }); %>
		
		<% 
        if(isEdit && competitors.length > 1){
        %>
			<p class="or">OR</p>
		<% } %>
        
	<% }else{ %>
		<% $("#similarsCompetitors").hide(); %>		                
	<% } %>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="remove-template">
    <% var competitors = obj.data.competitors,
		   isEdit = obj.data.isEdit; 		
	%>
    <% if(isEdit && competitors.length > 1){ %>
		<% $("#removeButton").show(); %>
        <a href="#" id="remove-vehicle">Remove Vehicle</a>
    <% }else{ %>
        <% $("#removeButton").hide(); %>                     
    <% }%>
</script>
